AnimatedText.part2: Contact us to kickstart your project!

first.title: Websites
first.description: We build websites for businesses and individuals. Whether you need a simple landing page or a dynamic blog, we have the expertise to create something unique that meets your needs, with an emphasis on design, speed, and SEO.

second.title: E-commerce
second.description: Looking to launch your own online store but don't know where to start? At Flux, we handle everything for you. From strategic planning and UI/UX design to integration with banks and shipping providers. Focus on your products and leave the technical side to us, ensuring a stable, secure, and high-performing online presence.

third.title: Custom Applications
third.description: We work with you to create tailored applications for managing your business's critical processes. Our goal is a digital upgrade that maximizes your team's efficiency and productivity, built exactly to your specifications.

intro.title: Our Process
intro.description: From the initial idea to final implementation, we follow a structured path to ensure the success of your project.

first.title: Contact
first.description: We analyze your goals and lay the foundation for a strategy that turns your vision into reality.

second.title: Design
second.description: We transform strategy into visuals, designing interfaces that are aesthetic, functional, and user-friendly.

third.title: Development
third.description: We turn design into code using modern technologies, ensuring maximum speed and a flawless appearance on every device.

fourth.title: Refinement
fourth.description: We work with you through successive revision stages until you are 100% satisfied with every detail of the project.

fifth.title: Launch
fifth.description: Your project goes live! We stay by your side for support, ensuring the smooth operation of your new site.

items.q: How long does it take to build a website?
items.a: Depending on the complexity of the project and your needs, it can range from 2 weeks for a simple website to 6 months for a complex e-shop.
Of course. We remain by your side for any technical support or upgrades your digital product may need.
Every project is designed with a 'Mobile First' approach, ensuring a perfect experience on every device.

items.q: Why choose custom design over a ready-made template?
items.a: A custom site is designed exclusively for your needs. It gives you the ability to customize every tiny detail. We can create something completely unique that stands out from the competition while providing unlimited scalability, unlike pre-made solutions.

items.q: Will I be able to update the content myself?
items.a: Certainly. We build your site with a user-friendly management interface, so you can easily change text, photos, and products without needing programming knowledge.

items.q: Is SEO included in the build?
items.a: Every project is delivered with 'Technical SEO' optimization. This means clean code, fast loading speeds, and proper structure so search engines can find you easily.

items.q: What is the cost for a custom project?
items.a: Every business has unique needs. After our initial communication, you will receive a detailed proposal tailored exactly to your plan and budget.

We don't limit ourselves to one solution. We choose the tech stack based on your needsâ€”from Astro for top-tier speed on static sites to Next.js for complex web apps. Our goal is always maximum performance and future scalability.
